sub_title: Antitrust, Compliance, Energy law - Lawyer/Avocat (Paris, Brussels), Rizom Legal - Lecturer (Paris 2 Assas, Paris Nanterre)
summary:
Avocat aux barreaux de Bruxelles et de Paris, je pratique le droit de la concurrence fran√ßais et europ√©en depuis 1992, en anglais et en fran√ßais, tant en contentieux qu'en conseil. Ma pratique inclut les programmes de compliance, les aides d'Etat, les pratiques anticoncurrentielles, ainsi que le contr√¥le des concentrations

J'enseigne √©galement le droit de la concurrence √† Paris 2 Panth√©on-Assas (M2/MBA de droit et management des affaires), le droit international des affaires √† Nanterre (Master Juriste europ√©en des affaires) et j'anime un s√©minaire sur les aides d'Etat √† HEC.

***
Admitted to the Paris and Brussels bar, I work in the field of French and EU competition law since 1992, both in French and English, both as counsellor and as litigator.  My practice encompasses compliance programmes, State aids, antitrust and merger control.

I also lecture in competition law at Paris 2 Panth√©on Assas University and in international business law at Paris Ouest Nanterre University, and I give a seminar on State aid issues at HEC Paris.


Academic:

1988 - LL.B summa cum laude, St-Louis, Brussels
1992 - LL.M cum laude, Louvain (Belgium)
2000 - Post-Graduate Diploma in Competition Law, King's College London
Since 2008: Director of Studies, Paris 2 Panth√©on-Assas (lecturer in antitrust law)
Since 2009: Lecturer in State aid law and International Business Law, University of Nanterre (Paris)

Professional:

- Admitted to the Brussels and Paris Bars
- 1991-1992 : Trainee, Legal Service, European Commission (Brussels)
- 1992-1995 : Associate, Lafleur Brown Canadian law firm (Brussels)
- 1995-2000 : Associate, Jeantet & Associ√©s (Paris)
- 2000-2002 : Senior Associate, then Partner as from April 2001, Herbert Smith (Paris)
- 2002-2005 : Partner, Clifford Chance (Paris)
- 2005-2013 : Partner, Hogan & Hartson (then Hogan Lovells as from 2010), Paris
- 2013-2015 : Partner, Reed Smith (Paris)
- 2015-today : Partner, DS Avocats (Paris and Brussels)

French, English, Dutch
